segments.text: it's hard to say , but i do love foxtrot and waltz .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how about rock and roll ã€‚
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: to tell the truth . i don't like it , it's too noisy .

segments.text: oh , it's really beautiful . but i just can't dance it well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: don't be so modest . i am sure you can dance it very well . then i'll see you at six . is that all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: great . i am your lucky fellow then .
